title: Topic 03 Question 08
body: Your company plans to deploy several Azure App Service web apps. The web apps will be deployed to the West Europe Azure region. The web apps will be accessed only by customers in Europe and the United States.
You need to recommend a solution to prevent malicious bots from scanning the web apps for vulnerabilities. The solution must minimize the attack surface.
What should you include in the recommendation?
options: Azure Traffic Manager and application security groups
Azure Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF)
